title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of the second row remaining, it is also removed.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should remain unchanged.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Press the Delete button.
2. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row is also removed.
